name: Scrap Fist
description:
Target 1 "Junk Warrior" you control; if it battles an opponent's monster this turn while you control it, apply these effects.
â— Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step.
â— If it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.
â— Double any battle damage your opponent takes.
â— It cannot be destroyed by battle.
â— Destroy the opponent's monster that battled it at the end of the Damage Step.
